#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#define _ ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);cin.tie(0);
using namespace std;
#define pb push_back
#define pob pop_back
#define pf push_front
#define pof pop_front
#define mp make_pair
#define all(a) a.begin(),a.end()
#define bitcnt(x) __builtin_popcountll(x)
#define MOD 1000000007
#define total 5000005
#define Me 1000000000001
#define NIL 0
#define MAXN 100005
#define EPS 1e-5
#define INF (1<<28)
#define pi 3.141593
typedef unsigned long long int uint64;
typedef long long int int64;
int n,c,sum;
int a[111];
bool used[111];
int dp[101][10001];
bool go(int idx,int cur){
	if(cur>c){
		dp[idx][cur]=0;
		return false;
	}
	if(cur<=c){
		int tmp=sum-cur;
		if(tmp<=c){
			dp[idx][cur]=1;
			return true;
		}
	}
	if(idx==n){
		dp[idx][cur]=0;
		return false;
	}
	
	if(dp[idx][cur]!=-1){
		if(dp[idx][cur]==1)
		return true;
		return false;
	}
	used[idx]=true;
	bool ret=go(idx+1,cur+a[idx]);
	if(ret){
		dp[idx][cur]=ret;
		return ret;
	}
	used[idx]=false;
	ret=go(idx+1,cur);
	dp[idx][cur]=ret;
	return ret;
}

int main(){
	int t,i;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--){
		memset(dp,-1,sizeof(dp));
		cin>>n>>c;
		sum=0;
		
		for(i=0;i<n;i++){
		cin>>a[i];
		sum+=a[i];}
		
		sort(a,a+n);
		
		memset(used,false,sizeof(used));
		if(go(0,0)){
			printf("YES\n");
			for(i=0;i<n;i++){
				if(used[i])
				printf("%d ",a[i]);
			}
			printf("\n");
			for(i=0;i<n;i++){
				if(!used[i])
				printf("%d ",a[i]);
			}
			printf("\n");
		}
		else{
			printf("NO\n");
		}
	}
	return 0;
}
